<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1273</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Birkat Hamazon9</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birkat Hamazon9</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Birkat Hamazon9</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Birkat Hamazon9</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Birkat Hamazon9</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Birkat Hamazon9</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Birkat Hamazon9</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson learners will explore different approaches towards mitzvot and apply them to Birkat Hamazon. The concept, role and purpose of mitzvot will be examined.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Birkat Hamazon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prayer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lookstein center</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mitzvot</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erforschen Anfänger 
unterschiedliche Annäherungen in Richtung zum mitzvot und wenden sie 
an Birkat Hamazon an. Das Konzept, die Rolle und der Zweck von 
mitzvot werden überprüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon les étudiants exploreront 
différentes attitudes en ce qui concerne le mitzvot et s'appliqueront
les à Birkat Hamazon. Le concept, le rôle et le but du mitzvot
seront examinés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição os learners explorarão 
aproximações diferentes para o mitzvot e aplicá-las-ão a Birkat 
Hamazon. O conceito, o papel e a finalidade do mitzvot serão 
examinados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione principianti esploreranno i 
metodi differenti verso mitzvot e li applicheranno a Birkat Hamazon. 
Il concetto, il ruolo e lo scopo di mitzvot saranno esaminati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα οι αρχάριοι θα ερευνήσουν τις 
διαφορετικές προσεγγίσεις προς το mitzvot και θα τις εφαρμόσουν 
σε Birkat Hamazon. Η έννοια, ο ρόλος και ο σκοπός του 
mitzvot θα εξεταστούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección los principiantes explorarán 
diversos acercamientos hacia mitzvot y los aplicarán a Birkat 
Hamazon. El concepto, el papel y el propósito del mitzvot 
serán examinados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birkat Hamazon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lookstein Mitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mitzvot</string>
          </keyword>
